title: Henry Ford's America
creator_credit: Donald Brittain, Janet Leissner, Paul Wright, Roman Kroitor and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: An inside look at the workings of the Ford Motor Company. Traces the history of the company using historical footage, and interviews with Henry Ford II and other company executives. Looks at the developing role of the car within American society. Script, Donald Brittain. Editing, Rosemarie Shapely and Les Halman. Images, Andreas Poulsson. Music, Art Phillips.
